alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Central Marion; Coastal Duval; Coastal Flagler; Coastal Nassau; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Trout River; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Duval; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Hard Freeze Watch issued December 23 at 2:26AM EST until December 25 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 2 AM TO 10 AM EST SATURDAY... ...HARD FREEZE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY EVENING THROUGH SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23 expected. For the Hard Freeze Watch, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 19 possible. * WHERE...Portions of northeast and northern Florida and southeast Georgia. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, from 2 AM to 10 AM EST Saturday. For the Hard Freeze Watch, from Saturday evening through Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
